com.ingenico.connect.gateway.sdk.java.defaultimpl

Class DefaultConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ingenico.connect.gateway.sdk.java.defaultimpl.DefaultConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Connection, LoggingCapable, PooledConnection, Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class DefaultConnection
extends Object
implements PooledConnection
    Connection implementation based on HttpClient.
